title: Loyalty Challenge Task Completion
description: Details about task completion records within a loyalty challenge's task, including completion date, accumulated values, item-level tracking, and completion attempt history.

xdm:completionDate.title: Completion Date
xdm:completionDate.description: Date and time when the task was completed.

xdm:accumulators.title: Accumulators
xdm:accumulators.description: Aggregated and item-level values that contributed to this task completion.

xdm:qty.title: Quantity
xdm:qty.description: Total quantity accumulated for this task completion.

xdm:spend.title: Spend
xdm:spend.description: Total spend accumulated for this task completion.
